name: Marvel's Spider-Man 2: New Game Plus Update
summary: The critically acclaimed and “Game of the Year” nominee (The Game Awards) Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 has new features now available via free patch update, including New Game+, Mission Replay Mode, New Accessibility Features, New Suits and more!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Marvel’s Spider-Man 2 - Game of the Year Trailer I PS5 Games
